AVSEC Circular No. 12 / 2011  
 
Subject :   Minimum Standards for Civil Aviation Security Equipment – 
Storage of recordings of CCTV system. 
 
     In continuation to this Bureau Circular No  2/2007 dated 14/2/2007, it 
is reiterated that the recordings of CCTV system shall be kept in the external 
device for a minimum period of 30 days as already mentioned in Circular No. 
33/2003 dated 25/11/2003. 
    This  issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA)
